channel.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
channel.description: Remove the time limit, I just looked at the Private server client hacking section, and I cannot be bothered waiting inbetween reports.

item.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
item.dc:creator: @Marine5288 Marine5288
item.description:
@Marine5288 wrote:

I agree with you Rash, but what Chassy13 said is right, people are idiots and they will abuse it.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:31, topic:398151”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=495284.msg3621342#msg3621342 date=1307443226]
If there’s several bad topics in the same section, we will try and best to spot them ourselves. I do admit the limit may be an annoyance to you, but it’s there for a reason as mentioned before and I doubt it will be removed.

Take this topic for example, I only needed one report to notify what’s wrong with it, but there was two. Imagine if everyone was free to report topics as often as they wanted to!

ps, it’s not immaturity, it’s just stupidness.
[/quote]

So when one is reported, a moderator will most likely go over the section quickly?[/quote]
Doubt that, most of the time moderators will deal with the thread that was reported and leave it at that, with this in mind, I just report all the threads that is needed to be moderated.

Read full topic

Take this topic for example, I only needed one report to notify what’s wrong with it, but there was two. Imagine if everyone was free to report topics as often as they wanted to!

ps, it’s not immaturity, it’s just stupidness.[/quote]

item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

If there’s several bad topics in the same section, we will try and best to spot them ourselves. I do admit the limit may be an annoyance to you, but it’s there for a reason as mentioned before and I doubt it will be removed.

Take this topic for example, I only needed one report to notify what’s wrong with it, but there was two. Imagine if everyone was free to report topics as often as they wanted to!

ps, it’s not immaturity, it’s just stupidness.

item.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Davidi2:

Immaturity can be by itself, it just causes people to do things that would make you think they are different. It may cause them to flame a lot, but that doesn’t mean they are an angry person in general.

This.

LilXCj:

Stupid people are stupid like you and this suggestion, now lock it please.

I am sorry for making suggestion.
Do you feel cool insulting people?

[quote=“n10si t, post:27, topic:398151”]side note: age != maturity

back when I ran my first server (I’ve run a total of 3) I had a moderator who was 11, and he was easily the most mature staff member I’ve ever had on any of my servers. Very respectful and very smart.[/quote]

Runespace (if you remember him) was quite mature, and he was only 12.

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Immaturity can be by itself, it just causes people to do things that would make you think they are different. It may cause them to flame a lot, but that doesn’t mean they are an angry person in general.

item.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:23, topic:398151”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=495284.msg3621189#msg3621189 date=1307419223]

Explain to me why you think this.
[/quote]Because you’re too stupid to realize that immaturity isn’t a quality that goes by itself. Selfishness is a quality that people who are immature usually have; ex., you. (Or at least the way you portray yourself in this thread points towards that.)

n10si t is right. You’re wrong. Get over it.

I don’t really care if this is off-topic or not. If you would have actually worded your original post as a well-written suggestion, rather than a selfish command, maybe I’d care about some useful input. But you didn’t, and in effect I don’t.

Usually have?

Some of the richest people in the world are selfish, I suppose they are immature aswell?[/quote]

None of us would know, we’ve never met them.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Rash:

Explain to me why you think this.

You must know selfish people. Do you think of them as mature?

You must know immature people. Are they selfish?

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:18, topic:398151”][quote author=Rash link=topic=495284.msg3621178#msg3621178 date=1307418854]

Being selfish makes you immature?
Right.

yes actually it does, fuckwit

Are you serious?

Immature: Having or showing emotional or intellectual development appropriate to someone younger
Selfish: Lacking consideration for others; concerned chiefly with one’s own personal profit or pleasure

How are they the same?

4 year olds don’t give a fuck about other people

11 year olds who put rats in their servers dont give a fuck about other people

immature people are selfish, wasn’t saying they mean the same thing

You said.

Being selfish makes you immature.

uh…

selfish people are immature, immature people are selfish

So people who think only about themselves are immature?
[/quote]

yes[/quote]

Explain to me why you think this.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Reporting posts
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:8, topic:398151”][quote author=Rash link=topic=495284.msg3621120#msg3621120 date=1307415244]

[quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=495284.msg3621080#msg3621080 date=1307412797]

Remove the time limit, I just looked at the Private server client hacking section, and I cannot be bothered waiting inbetween reports.
[/quote]You “can’t be bothered.” Sorry if something affects you negatively in life. Immature idiot.

How the fuck does me not wanting to waste my time make me immature?
Fuckhead.

Actually, I kind of agree. The wait can be a pain, and often times I find myself reporting an individual user for excessive flame/trolling in a single area.

This.

It could be reduced to 15 seconds even.

It’s been suggested before, I know that much. However removing the timer could lead to people being annoying and mass reporting for no apparent reason. People will abuse whatever they can, because they’re people.

They could restrict it to a people with a certain amount of posts, and deal harshly with people who put in false reports.

The forums are disgusting at the moment.
[/quote]“I cannot be bothered”. It’s just the immaturity of that little snippet right there. It bothers me when anybody says that in an argument for something. “I cannot be bothered to do my homework”, it’s like that. Sorry if something does not work the exact way you want it to. It’s one of the most selfish statements I can think of. That’s how it makes you immature. Good enough explanation?[/quote]

Being selfish makes you immature?
Right.

Also, I am not being selfish.

Look at the reason I posted this thread, to help not me, but the community.

Read full topic
